trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> objects that are selected in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>物件中所選<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The order of rows in the collection is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were selected.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的資料列的順序不會保證以符合之前選取的順序。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>類別直接。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: To clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified row is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的資料列是否包含在集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>中尋找<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if dataGridViewRow is in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 dataGridViewRow 存在於集合中; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的元素複製到指定的陣列，指定索引處開始。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合複製之項目的端一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 複製在陣列中以零為起始的索引開始。

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index小於零。

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: array是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
trans-unit.target: -中的項目數大於可用空間index結尾array。

trans-unit.source: The cannot be cast automatically to the type of array.
trans-unit.target: 無法自動轉換成的型別 array 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a row into the collection at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 資料列插入集合中指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>類別直接。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: To insert a row into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要插入資料列插入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `dataGridViewRow` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引處`dataGridViewRow`應該插入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>插入<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: index小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- index is equal to or greater than the number of rows in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或-index位於此集合中的相等或更高的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt*> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt*>方法。</xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt*>

trans-unit.source: Always throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 一律會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>類別直接。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: To remove a row from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。
